description:
Don't struggle with many hours of learning code.

This course covers the key features of Xcode, and teaches the basics for iOS app development with little code using Objective-C. Dedric explores the Xcode user interface; reviews the code editors, including version and assistant editors. The final chapter covers publishing your app to the app store.

Winner of CNET tech course of the year!

Topics include:

· Learning the iOS coding language Objective-C

· Icon & button optimization

· Adding objects & supporting files

· Exploring the code editors

· Making interface connections

· Creating an iPhone storyboard interface

· Testing your app for errors

· Publishing your app to the app store
title: Build iPhone Apps with Ease
